body:
Does the software allow you to print images and save the image files?  I've been using HDRVIEW under windows which works great.  I only wish it had better printing and saving capabilities.

http://www.debevec.org/FiatLux/hdrview/

This is very handy if you run radiance under Cygwin or something similar.

Mark
